Name: UNITY_SAMPLE_FULL_SH_PER_PIXEL
Official Comments: Lightmap UVs and ambient color from SHL2 are shared in the vertex to pixel interpolators. Do full SH evaluation in the pixel shader when static lightmap and LIGHTPROBE_SH is enabled.

Name: UNITY_TANGENT_ORTHONORMALIZE
Official Comments:
Orthnormalize Tangent Space basis per-pixel
Necessary to support high-quality normal-maps. Compatible with Maya and Marmoset.
However xNormal expects oldschool non-orthnormalized basis - essentially preventing good looking normal-maps :(
Due to the fact that xNormal is probably _the most used tool to bake out normal-maps today_ we have to stick to old ways for now.

Disabled by default, until xNormal has an option to bake proper normal-maps.

Name: UNITY_STANDARD_SIMPLE
Official Comments: Simplified Standard Shader is off by default and should not be used for Legacy Shaders

Name: UNITY_REQUIRE_FRAG_WORLDPOS
Official Comments: Setup a new define with meaningful name to know if we require world pos in fragment shader

Name: UNITY_PACK_WORLDPOS_WITH_TANGENT
Official Comments:
Should we pack worldPos along tangent (saving an interpolator)
We want to skip this on mobile platforms, because worldpos gets packed into mediump
